ygData.msgSnippet: ... very ... about. ... I ... attack ... longer ... much ... ideas My point is that More HPs is not a pointless improvement .  More HPs save you from dying.
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Mon, 19 Jul 1999 17:04:29 EDT
> From: Morix@...
>Subject: Warrior rebuttal
>
>>>>>>>>More HPs - Lets us take more damage<<<<<
>>>
>>>A pointless improvement, IMHO. If I'm solo I already have to spend a
very
>>>long time sitting and waiting for my health to come back. Last thing I
>need
>>>is to have to wait LONGER.
>>
>>Would you rather wait LONGER for more HPs to regen or would you prefer
>>death?
>
>Well gee, if I had the choose so blindly of course I would take the wait
>time. However, your question doesn't really address what I'm talking
about.
>More often than not, the reason a monster would beat me down is NOT because
I
>didn't have enough hit points to stand up to it, but because I miss my
attack
>over and over. Having extra HP only means I get to hang out a little
longer
>while the creature that's too tough for me to beat makes my demise that
much
>more painful. This directly relates to 2 of the 3 warrior improvements
ideas


My point is that More HPs is not a "pointless improvement". More HPs save
you from dying. I know I've zoned with less that 20 HPs many many times.
And there have been many times when I died just short of the zone. If I had
just a few more HPs, I could have made it.

More HPs is something many Warriors have demanded. They felt insulted when
a hybrid with the same race and STA can have the same HPs as a Warrior.
This is something that should have been in the game from day 1. To say that
more HPs are pointless and only makes you wait longer to regen them is
ridiculous.


>I came up with that I think would be much more useful:


The only reason I didn't comment on your other suggestions is because I
agreed with them for the most part.

>
>1: Increased chance of hitting with an attack (increased over the hybrids
>anyway).


Agreed. Make the cap on Off/Def 6*lvl+5 or 5*lvl +10

>2: Remove or change Berzerker Frenzy. It is not a help, it's a hinderance.


Agreed. Make it an active skill usable once a day or something.

>I'll reiterate my other one, even though it doesn't relate to the above.
>
>3: Make Kick and Bash/Slam non-mutaually exclusive.


I like it the way it is. Soemtimes is it better to kick. Othertimes you
want to bash (for the stun). Being able to do both at the same time would
eliminate a choice.



Wayne
